/** * This is a reference that really is is Weak, as it uses the * appropriate java.lang.ref class. * @deprecated since 1.7. * Just use {@link java.lang.ref.WeakReference} directly. * Note that in ant1.7 is parent was changed to extend HardReference. * This is because the latter has access to the (package scoped) * WeakishReference(Object) constructor, and both that and this are thin * facades on the underlying no-longer-abstract base class. */
